concept.title: Library panel
concept.shortdesc: The Library panel offers a central location to access 2D and 3D block libraries.

section.title: Block library
section.p: The block library is organized by categories. Select a category to view its blocks. Categories and blocks may be user-defined or pre-defined by BricsCAD. You can scroll through the categories and blocks using the mouse wheel or the scroll bar. The availability of pre-defined blocks depends on your license level.

section.title: Search
section.p: Searches the library for words you enter in the search box.

section.title: View
section.p: Toggles between grid and list views of the block content.

section.title: Home
section.p: Returns the block library to the home screen.

section.title: Add
section.p: Opens the Add Block to Library dialog box.
